column3: but really dark lighting. The bone marrow was really tasty - I could have gone with another plate or two (or three)
column4: the aged ribeye my boyfriend got was good
column5: the pork I ordered was good and the sides were typical sides. I wasn't too impressed with their seafood menu even though our server recommended it was the best of the best
column6: but you can't beat seafood from the PNW. Drinks were well concocted and nice and strong! Was it the best steak I've had in my life? No. Would I come back in my next visit to Chicago? Probably not.
